title: England is toast
author: VD
content_html:
Now they’re just begging for trouble:

Two male priests exchanged vows and rings in a ceremony that was conducted using one of the church’s most traditional wedding rites – a decision seen as blasphemous by conservatives.

Do you want science? Here’s a falsifiable hypothesis: a Christian society that turns from God will, over the course of 100 years, devolve into a violent, dictatorial and pagan society rather than the shiny, democratic secular science fiction society that so many atheists expect.
